attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Type is app unless newer types of specific applications are introduced

attributes.name: timestampUTC
attributes.description: UTC time when the request originated

attributes.name: path
attributes.description: path is used to identify for which the message is meant. Since all app messages are handled by Agent core this field will be blank.

attributes.name: action
attributes.description: Action to be undertaken with resect to the application. Actions can be install/uninstall etc

attributes.name: packageName
attributes.description: Name of the application on which action is to be taken
